Okay I love these! I wanted a more bold shape with my true oval and smaller-than-average face that wasn’t HUGE like some others I’ve tried on. These fit great, maybe a tad bit tight behind my ears, but they definitely will stretch after a few wears. They block the sun great and have a beautiful shade without looking foggy. I think they’re priced perfectly for what they are. They’ll probably scratch easy, but I don’t mind that. I got these for vacation and in my husband’s truck so I don’t have to lug my expensive Ray Bans around all the time. I personally think glasses look different with hair up/down so I included both styles so you can see how it looks! Love these. 😊
